modName: Silverlight Armor clothing version ESP only
summary: Adding clothing version of silverlight armor to fit mage character game play. This is ESP only, original mod is required for this to work.
descriptionHtml:
Silverlight Armor clothing version ESP only
Released on 31th of March 2012
Original mod by Jojjo and Frozzled
Esp modified by masiyuan1989 with permission from one of the original mod authors Jojjo

Change log

v1.1 released 1th of April
Added non-enchanted version of rob (body slot)
Now craft able in forge, enchanted version require gems as material
Screen shot added

v1.0 released 31th of March
Initial release

Description

Silverlight armor is perhaps the most amazing armor design I have ever seen in the nexus. However, it has been a pity that as a big fan of pure mage play style, I take penalties using silverlight armor due to its light armor nature. (wasting exp on light armor skills, unable to benefit from alteration perks)

So I made some modification to the original esp file, adding clothing version of silverlight set to fit mage characters\' need. There are 4 pieces in total, with the main armor enchanted with archmage rob enchantment. (100% increased magica regen, 15% magica cost reduction for all magic schools)

Requirement

Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE, by jojjo and Frozzled
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251

How to get it

Use in game conceal and type in:
help silverlight 4
Then it will show a list of all silverlight armor and my modified clothing version, each with an item ID such as, xx000d62 where the xx is your load order of the esp.
Then  type in the following command for which ever piece you need:
player.additem (item ID) 1
And the piece will be added into your inventory.
New in v1.1: you can now craft the clothing versions using forge, arcane blacksmithing perk is required.

Install

Download using NMM then activate. NOTE, activate it after you install the original mod, press \"yes to all\" to over write the original .esp file.

Uninstall

Simply deactivate the mod in NMM

Credit

Thanks Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks Jojjo and Frozzled for creating the asome silverlight armor

Licence

You can not make any modification of any part of this mod without the permission from Jojjo - the author of silverlight armor.
